I am a PhD student of Wolfgang LÃ¼ck at the University of Bonn and the Max Planck Institute for Mathematics.

My research interests lie in algebraic and geometric topology. More specifically, I am thinking about algebraic $ K $- and $ L $-theory and their relation to the topology of manifolds. I am also intersted in $L^2$-invariants.
